text:
The reduced form analytics functionality has been putting a huge damper on my team - really aggravating that HubSpot would cripple a useful tool so aggressively.

Sharing a couple of posts from the ideas forum in case you feel the same way and want to join the dissent -
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Please-bring-detailed-form-reports-back/idi-p/784497>

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Filter-Form-Analytics/idi-p/783748>
I wish you could name Custom Code Actions in the workflow view. :smile:
